alert.note: Alert for Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 5:26PM CDT until April 22 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Texas County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Eastern Cimarron County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 525 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles south of Elkhart to 9 miles west of Texhoma, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported golf ball size hail. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Guymon, Goodwell, Texhoma, Eva, Hough, Griggs and Sturgis. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
